Package index

Format statistical objects

format_stats()
Format statistical results
format_stats(<aov>)
Format ANOVA statistics
format_stats(<BFBayesFactor>)
Format Bayes factors
format_stats(<easycorrelation>)
Format correlation statistics
format_stats(<htest>)
Format hypothesis test statistics
format_stats(<lm>)
Format (generalized) linear regression statistics

Format statistical values

format_summary() format_mean() format_meanci() format_meanse() format_meansd() format_median() format_medianiqr()
Calculate and format summary statistics of central tendency and error
format_p()
Format p-values
format_bf()
Format Bayes factors
format_corr() superseded
Format correlation statistics
format_ttest() superseded
Format t-test statistics

Format numbers/characters

format_num()
Format numbers
format_scientific()
Format numbers in scientific notation
format_chr()
Format character strings with italics and type
format_sub()
Format subscript text
